author: @AP
message: BREAKING: Loud explosions reported in Caracas near Fort Tiuna. Unconfirmed reports of U.S. aircraft over the Venezuelan capital. #Venezuela

author: @ReutersWorld
message: Witnesses in Caracas report heavy gunfire and several low-flying helicopters near the presidential residence. Communication lines appearing to flicker. #Caracas

author: @MarocRubio
message: Justice is coming. #OperationAbsoluteResolve

author: @TheGuardian
message: Venezuelan Vice President Delcy Rodríguez denounces 'brazen aggression' as reports of a U.S.-led raid on President Maduro's residence circulate.

author: @CNNBrk
message: President Donald Trump announces the capture of Nicolás Maduro in a successful overnight military extraction in Caracas. #MaduroCaptured

author: @WhiteHouse
message: President Trump: 'Last night, at my direction, U.S. forces conducted a surgical operation to bring outlaw dictator Nicolás Maduro to justice.'

author: @DeptofWar
message: Operation Absolute Resolve: U.S. Army Delta Force and CIA operatives successfully extracted Nicolás Maduro and wife Cilia Flores from Caracas. No U.S. casualties reported.

author: @DonaldTrump
message: Maduro is in custody! We are going to run Venezuela properly and get the oil flowing again. A great day for the hemisphere!

author: @Reuters
message: Trump posts photo of a blindfolded Nicolás Maduro in a gray sweatsuit aboard the USS Iwo Jima. #Venezuela

author: @AP_Politics
message: Attorney General Pam Bondi announces superseding indictment against Maduro and Flores for narco-terrorism and cocaine importation. #JusticeDept

author: @BBCWorld
message: World leaders react: Brazil’s Lula calls the U.S. raid a 'dangerous precedent'; Argentina’s Milei hails the end of a 'bloody dictatorship.'

author: @ABC
message: U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio: 'Maduro is the head of a narco-terror organization. He will now face the full wrath of American justice.'

author: @nytimes
message: Analysis: Trump’s move to 'run' Venezuela marks a radical shift in U.S. foreign policy, echoing 19th-century interventionism. #Venezuela

author: @WSJ
message: Oil markets volatile as Trump signals U.S. companies will take control of Venezuelan oil infrastructure to 'modernize' it. #OPEC #Oil

author: @CBSNews
message: Exclusive: U.S. military officials say over 150 aircraft were involved in the Venezuelan operation to provide cover for ground teams.

author: @UN_News
message: UN Secretary-General Guterres 'deeply alarmed' by U.S. military action in Venezuela; calls for respect of international law.

author: @MariaCorinaYA
message: A new dawn for Venezuela. We thank the United States for their bravery in ending the usurpation. #Libertad

author: @MSNBC
message: Sen. Tim Kaine criticizes 'unauthorized attack' on Venezuela, says Trump put American servicemembers at risk without Congressional approval.

author: @FoxNews
message: Senate Majority Leader John Thune praises 'decisive action' in Maduro's capture, says world is safer without the narco-regime.

author: @ReutersLatam
message: Protests break out in Rio de Janeiro and Mexico City against U.S. intervention in Venezuela. #HandsOffVenezuela

author: @TheHill
message: Trump on Air Force One: 'It's our hemisphere. We’re in the business of having countries around us that are viable.'

author: @AP_Courts
message: A plane carrying Nicolás Maduro and Cilia Flores has landed at Stewart Air National Guard Base in New York. Heavy security present.

author: @NYDailyNews
message: Maduro arrives in NYC. The former strongman was seen being led into a hangar by federal agents before a helicopter transfer to Manhattan.

author: @WNYC
message: NYPD and Federal agents block off streets around the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn where Maduro is expected to be held.

author: @DailyMail
message: Pictured: Cilia Flores seen with large bandages on her face following the chaotic extraction from Caracas. #Maduro

author: @Just_Security
message: Legal experts debate 'Head of State' immunity as Maduro prepares for his first U.S. court appearance. #InternationalLaw

author: @SkyNews
message: Reports from Caracas: At least 80 killed during 'Operation Absolute Resolve,' according to unnamed Venezuelan officials. #Venezuela

author: @AlJazeera_World
message: Iran and Russia condemn Maduro's 'abduction,' calling it a violation of sovereignty and international norms.

author: @Bloomberg
message: U.S. stocks tied to energy and defense see gains following the successful raid in Venezuela. #Markets

author: @TIME
message: Inside the raid: Delta Force operatives utilized months of intelligence and naval blockades to isolate the Maduro residence. #CoverStory

author: @ViceNews
message: Clashes reported outside the Manhattan federal courthouse between pro-Maduro protesters and members of the Venezuelan diaspora.

author: @ReutersWorld
message: Monday Morning: Nicolás Maduro and Cilia Flores arrive at federal court in Manhattan under heavy armored escort.

author: @VictoriaBekiempis
message: I’m inside the courtroom. Maduro is wearing khaki pants and a blue shirt. He just shouted 'Happy New Year!' to the gallery in English.

author: @TheGuardian
message: Maduro appears in court in ankle shackles. He tells the judge through a translator: 'I am a prisoner of war. I am still the President.'

author: @AP
message: BREAKING: Nicolás Maduro and Cilia Flores plead not guilty to narco-terrorism and weapons charges in New York federal court.

author: @CNNBrk
message: Judge Alvin Hellerstein orders Maduro to remain held without bail. Next hearing set for March 17. #MaduroTrial

author: @ABCWorldNews
message: Maduro's lawyer calls the capture a 'military abduction' and vows to challenge the legality of the U.S. jurisdiction.

author: @CBSNews
message: Trump administration officials say they are already in talks with 'legitimate' Venezuelan figures to begin the transition of power.

author: @NBCNews
message: White House signals it may subsidize U.S. energy firms to rebuild Venezuela's oil infrastructure within 18 months.

author: @ReutersWorld
message: Acting Venezuelan leader Delcy Rodríguez calls for 'peaceful coexistence' despite the capture of her predecessor. #Venezuela

author: @Politico
message: GOP lawmakers push for immediate recognition of a new Venezuelan government following Maduro's arraignment.

author: @TheEconomist
message: The Maduro Vacuum: With the strongman in a Brooklyn cell, who actually controls the Venezuelan military today?

author: @WashingtonPost
message: Report: CIA assessment suggests Maduro loyalists like Delcy Rodríguez are best positioned to maintain stability during the transition.

author: @USNews
message: UN Security Council meeting erupts in shouting match as U.S. Ambassador Mike Waltz defends the 'surgical law enforcement operation.'

author: @France24_en
message: European leaders divided: France and Germany express 'grave concern' over military force while Poland supports the U.S. move.

author: @MiamiHerald
message: Exiles in Doral celebrate: 'We never thought we’d see the day he was in a U.S. courtroom.' #VenezuelaLibre

author: @Just_Security
message: New Analysis: The 2026 raid on Caracas and its implications for 'Personal Immunity' of world leaders. #MaduroTrial

author: @AP_Politics
message: Fact Check: No evidence supports Trump’s claim that Maduro 'sent' Tren de Aragua gangs to terrorize the U.S. #PolitiFact

author: @TheGuardian
message: Maduro remains defiant in his first 30 minutes before a U.S. judge: 'I am a decent man. I am innocent.'

author: @ReutersWorld
message: As of Jan 6, 2026, Maduro is being held at the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn. The legal battle of the century begins.
